content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Google Analytics Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Here are just a few of the many questions about your website that you can answer using Google Analytics Services .

• How many people visit my website?
• Where do my visitors live?
• Do I need a mobile-friendly website?
• Which websites send traffic to my website?
• What marketing tactics drive the most traffic to my website?
• Which pages on my website are the most popular?
• How many visitors have I converted into leads or customers?
• Where did my converting visitors come from and go on my website?
• How can I improve my website’s speed?
• What blog content do my visitors like the most?[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10398″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Google Analytics Setup” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]To track the success of your SEO strategies, it is important to make sure your website optimization & marketing efforts are analyzed timely. Google Analytics account implementation is surely the most widely used web analytics applications to track the performance of a website. Google Analytics implementation services offered by Digital Consulting Pandit helps you track the results of your SEO & marketing efforts. Also helps you to design a forecast marketing strategy to improve your performance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]We offer expert and best practice setup of your Google Analytics account and tracking that includes:

  • Account setup
  • Page tagging
  • User setup
  • Profile creation
  • Goal & funnel setup
  • Filter implementation

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[vc_column_text]

  • eCommerce tracking
  • Site search tracking
  • Advanced segmentation setup
  • Campaign tagging
  • Report scheduling
  • Custom report building

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Related Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Social Media Marketing

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

SEO

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Website Designing

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
